content: in next 2tc in next tc in next 2dc in next half_double_crochet in next single_crochet in next and slip_stitch do not fasten_off make the other side of the leaf while still attached to the side you just completed 1 chain 11 2 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain 2dc in next chain tc in next chain 2tc in next tc in next 2dc in next half_double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in last chain 3 working on the other side of the chain half_double_crochet in the first chain 2dc in next tc in next 2tc in next tc in next 2dc in next half_double_crochet in next single_crochet in next and slip_stitch do not fasten_off put the two sides together so the stitches line up and slip_stitch each st together working around the leaf you should end up with a double layered leaf - fasten_off and weave in ends alternatively you can make two separate leaf panels and sew them together @taimilktea crochet assembly flower sew the two flower sides together using the long tail end of one side make sure to sew along the edge so that the shape of each petal is still visible charm using the flower centre or leaf colour attach crochet hook in between two petals chain 35 length can be varied depending on usage insert hook into the tip of the leaf and slip_stitch weave in ends for a thicker chain you can slip_stitch again through the 35 chain you can use it as a bookmark bag charm on your headphones etc thanks for using this pattern tag me @taimilktea crochet in your posts so that i can see your creations @taimilktea crochet
